04000000 01536328 52807CF4

[add shield -> max shield]
04000000 0157D938 52807CF4

[set hearts full when changed]
04000000 017AA7D8 52800C73

[Can buy with coin unless coins own == cost]
04000000 0157F118 1A9F07E0

[Spend coins to have max, you don't really need this one if you use the above cheat]
04000000 0157F49C 52807CE1
